title: Hmm I have a quite unique problem...
body: Im only getting the PBE Client when i click on the NA Download ( when i click on my Summoner icon )

replies.body: Nothing unique, you APPLY to PBE and then it takes a while for you to be accepted, dependent on how many accounts are cleared up. Took me about 2 years personally, so do not expect access anytime soon after having applied.

The PBE client is available to download for anyone; however, you need to sign up for a PBE account to gain access.  You can sign up for PBE [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)!  Just a heads up, we can't expedite or force acceptance to the pbe, but our [FAQ ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq)has some insight on how they're chosen.  Good luck!
